![](http://joeyday.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/09/n727006457_1378956_6844-150x150.jpg "Joey and nickel jar with 490 nickels")

My mother-in-law gave me $20 in nickels for my birthday (that’s 400 nickels if you’re counting with me at home), along with a jar that counts coins as you drop them in through a slot in the top. If the jar is accurate, I have 490 nickels in there currently. Add to that the 21 nickels I have in my PayPal account, and I’m up to 511. Only 31,489 nickels to go. Sweet!

If you’re paying attention, the number of nickels in my PayPal account hasn’t changed at all since my last update. Is a nickel too much to ask? Come on all you PayPal users out there! Click the button. I dare you! ![End mark](http://joeyday.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/08/endmark.png "End mark")
